column4: Three lanes inbound and one lane outbound from 3:00 p.m. to 4 p.m.
Normal lane configuration from 4 p.m. to 7 p.m.
Three lanes outbound and one lane inbound from 7:00 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.

column5: Vehicles in the intersection.  Most of the intersection is shutdown.  Motorists should seek an alternate route.

column4: Intersection is in post-game configuration.  Alumni Dr is ONE WAY from the stadium to Nicholasville Rd.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: All traffic approaching from Cooper Dr MUST turn left onto Alumni Dr.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: Alumni Dr traffic from the stadium to Tates Creek MUST turn right onto Tates Creek Rd.
